description: Sets bit rate, color information, etc.

items.label: 50M 4:2:2 10bit
items.description: Higher image quality with better color sampling and bit depth.

items.label: 50M 4:2:0 8bit
items.description: Standard quality with reduced color sampling and bit depth.

items.label: 25M 4:2:0 8bit
items.description: Lower image quality with minimum color sampling and bit depth.

hint: The higher the bit rate, the higher the image quality.
note: [4:2:2 10 bit] is a setting that assumes that the recorded movie will be edited on a computer. The playback environment for [4:2:2 10 bit] is limited.
